summary: This is an NCIC (National Crime Information Center) delayed response page showing a criminal record check for Tova Noel, conducted by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services. The search found no active wants or warrants for Noel in the NCIC system.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.role: Subject of NCIC criminal record check
persons.context: Individual whose criminal record was searched through the NCIC system by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency conducting the NCIC search.

events.title: NCIC criminal record check for Tova Noel
events.description: The New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services conducted an NCIC search for Tova Noel, which returned no active wants or warrants.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: Tova Noel was the subject of an NCIC criminal record check conducted by New York State authorities.
The search found no active wants or warrants for Tova Noel in the NCIC system.
The document shows the NCIC search was conducted on December 11, 2019.
The search was performed by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.
The document contains warnings about unauthorized dissemination of NCIC information.
